property.name: ranger.plugin.trino.policy.rest.url
property.description: MANDATORY: a comma separated list of URLs to Apache Ranger instances in a deployment

property.name: ranger.plugin.trino.use.rangerGroups
property.description: Boolean flag to specify whether user-to-groups mapping should be obtained from in Apache Ranger. Default: false

property.name: ranger.plugin.trino.use.only.rangerGroups
property.description: Boolean flag. true: use only user-to-groups mapping from Apache Ranger; false: use user-to-groups mappings from Apache Ranger and Trino. Default: false

property.name: ranger.plugin.trino.super.users
property.description: Comma separated list of user names. Superusers will be authorized for all accesses, without requiring explicit policy grants.

property.name: ranger.plugin.trino.super.groups
property.description: Comma separated list of group names. Users in supergroups will be authorized for all accesses, without requiring explicit policy grants
